comment: This is a rectangular text box containing classical Chinese characters in vertical columns, likely from a dictionary or lexicon such as the Shuowen Jiezi. The text includes both ancient script forms (likely seal script) and explanatory Han characters, with phonetic annotations (e.g., '切', '聲') and etymological descriptions. The layout is traditional, with text flowing top to bottom and right to left. A black border frames the entire block of text.
